posts.post_content:
Just starting up a T202 set.

Looking for mid-grade cards in the PSA 2-4/SGC 20-40 range.  In general, just nice VG/VGEX cards.  My key issue will be sharp focus and registration.  Please let me know if you have anything available.  

Please send scans and prices to me at:  [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]

Thanks in advance,
Craig
